00093 void fetch_reg_options(struct opt_odb_t * odb, struct core_knobs_t * knobs)
00094 {
00095   /* branch prediction */
00096   opt_reg_string_list(odb, "-bpred", "bpred configuration string(s) [DS]",
00097       knobs->fetch.bpred_opt_str, MAX_HYBRID_BPRED, &knobs->fetch.num_bpred_components, knobs->fetch.bpred_opt_str, /* print */true, /* format */NULL, /* !accrue */false);
00098 
00099   opt_reg_string(odb, "-bpred:fusion","fusion/meta-prediction algorithm configurations string [DS]",
00100       &knobs->fetch.fusion_opt_str, /*default*/ "none", /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00101 
00102   opt_reg_string(odb, "-bpred:btb","branch target buffer configuration configuration string [DS]",
00103       &knobs->fetch.dirjmpbtb_opt_str, /*default*/ "btac:BTB:1024:4:8:l", /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00104 
00105   opt_reg_string(odb, "-bpred:ibtb","indirect branch target buffer configuration string [DS]",
00106       &knobs->fetch.indirjmpbtb_opt_str, /*default*/ "none", /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00107 
00108   opt_reg_string(odb, "-bpred:ras","return address stack predictor configuration string [DS]",
00109       &knobs->fetch.ras_opt_str, /*default*/ "stack:RAS:16", /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00110 
00111   opt_reg_int(odb, "-jeclear:delay","additional latency from branch-exec to jeclear [D]",
00112       &knobs->fetch.jeclear_delay, /*default*/ 1, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00113 
00114 
00115   opt_reg_string(odb, "-il1","1st-level instruction cache configuration string [DS]",
00116       &knobs->memory.IL1_opt_str, /*default*/ "IL1:64:8:64:4:16:3:L:8", /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00117   opt_reg_string(odb, "-itlb","instruction TLB configuration string [DS]",
00118       &knobs->memory.ITLB_opt_str, /*default*/ "ITLB:32:4:1:3:L:1", /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00119   opt_reg_string_list(odb, "-il1:pf", "1st-level instruction cache prefetcher configuration string(s) [DS]",
00120       knobs->memory.IL1PF_opt_str, MAX_PREFETCHERS, &knobs->memory.IL1_num_PF, knobs->memory.IL1PF_opt_str, /* print */true, /* format */NULL, /* !accrue */false);
00121   opt_reg_int(odb, "-il1:pf:fifosize","IL1 prefetch FIFO size [DS]",
00122       &knobs->memory.IL1_PFFsize, /*default*/ 8, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00123   opt_reg_int(odb, "-il1:pf:buffer","IL1 prefetch buffer size [D]",
00124       &knobs->memory.IL1_PF_buffer_size, /*default*/ 0, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00125   opt_reg_int(odb, "-il1:pf:filter","IL1 prefetch filter size [D]",
00126       &knobs->memory.IL1_PF_filter_size, /*default*/ 0, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00127   opt_reg_int(odb, "-il1:pf:filterreset","IL1 prefetch filter reset interval (cycles) [D]",
00128       &knobs->memory.IL1_PF_filter_reset, /*default*/ 65536, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00129   opt_reg_int(odb, "-il1:pf:thresh","IL1 prefetch threshold (only prefetch if MSHR occupancy < thresh) [DS]",
00130       &knobs->memory.IL1_PFthresh, /*default*/ 4, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00131   opt_reg_int(odb, "-il1:pf:max","maximum IL1 prefetch requests in MSHRs at a time [DS]",
00132       &knobs->memory.IL1_PFmax, /*default*/ 2, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00133   opt_reg_double(odb, "-il1:pf:lowWM","IL1 low watermark for prefetch control [DS]",
00134       &knobs->memory.IL1_low_watermark, /*default*/ 0.3, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00135   opt_reg_double(odb, "-il1:pf:highWM","IL1 high watermark for prefetch control [DS]",
00136       &knobs->memory.IL1_high_watermark, /*default*/ 0.5, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00137   opt_reg_int(odb, "-il1:pf:WMinterval","IL1 sampling interval (in cycles) for prefetch control (0 = no PF controller) [DS]",
00138       &knobs->memory.IL1_WMinterval, /*default*/ 0, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00139   opt_reg_flag(odb, "-il1:pf:miss","generate IL1 prefetches only from miss traffic [DS]",
00140       &knobs->memory.IL1_PF_on_miss, /*default*/ false, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00141 
00142   opt_reg_int(odb, "-byteQ:size","number of entries in byteQ [DS]",
00143       &knobs->fetch.byteQ_size, /*default*/ knobs->fetch.byteQ_size, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00144   opt_reg_int(odb, "-byteQ:linesize","linesize of byteQ (bytes) [DS]",
00145       &knobs->fetch.byteQ_linesize, /*default*/ knobs->fetch.byteQ_linesize, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00146 
00147   opt_reg_int(odb, "-predecode:depth","number of stages in predecode pipe [D]",
00148       &knobs->fetch.depth, /*default*/ knobs->fetch.depth, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00149   opt_reg_int(odb, "-predecode:width","width of predecode pipe (Macro-ops) [D]",
00150       &knobs->fetch.width, /*default*/ knobs->fetch.width, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00151 
00152   opt_reg_int(odb, "-IQ:size","size of instruction queue (Macro-ops - placed between predecode and decode) [D]",
00153       &knobs->fetch.IQ_size, /*default*/ knobs->fetch.IQ_size, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00154 
00155   opt_reg_flag(odb, "-warm:bpred","warm branch predictors during functional fast-forwarding [DS]",
00156       &knobs->fetch.warm_bpred, /*default*/ false, /*print*/true,/*format*/NULL);
00157 }

00175 class core_fetch_t * fetch_create(const char * fetch_opt_string, struct core_t * core)
00176 {
